named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalPorMes
named-native-query.query: Select FORMAT(documento1_.docdatemi, 'dd') as dia, sum(comissao0_.comprcvda) as total from COMISSAO comissao0_ inner join documento documento1_ on comissao0_.saicod=documento1_.doccod where comissao0_.lojcod=documento1_.lojcod and documento1_.oricod='009' and docdatemi between '2016-01-01' and '2016-01-31' group by documento1_.docdatemi Order by documento1_.docdatemi desc
